### MR Acceptance Checklist

- [ ] Merge Request is set to squash commits.
- [ ] Final commit message edited to follow [Conventional Commit](https://www.conventionalcommits.org/) guideline.
- [ ] Code follows UL code conventions and [google style](https://google.github.io/styleguide/pyguide) guidelines.
- [ ] Tests cover both standard use cases and edge cases.
- [ ] Test coverage for the package is unchanged or improved.
- [ ] Documentation reflects the changes that were made.
- [ ] Changes have been documented in the CHANGELOG.md following [Keep a Changelog](https://keepachangelog.com/en/1.1.0/) conventions.
